Detailed Description

This program was created to make a set of classes to be used for easy website creation. Usage: simply extend the DB_Object class to make models and the OUT_Request class to make controllers. HTML is stored in templates with special tags. See the OUT_Template class for more details. Made by Tyler Romeo <tylerromeo@gmail.com>
